history.proof: intros R1 R2 tr. split. - intros H. split. + intros k s ms H1. sfirstorder depth: 3. + intros k s ms H1. sfirstorder depth: 3. - intros [H1 H2]. intros k s ms H3. split. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment state : Type R1, R2 : state -> MetaState state -> Prop tr : trace state H : sound_trace (fun (s : state) (ms : MetaState state) => R1 s ms /\\ R2 s ms) tr k : nat s : state ms : MetaState state H1 : tr k = Some (s, ms) Unable to unify "sound_trace (fun (s : state) (ms : MetaState state) => R1 s ms /\\ R2 s ms) tr" with "R1 s ms".

original: intros R1 R2 tr. split. - intros H. split. + intros k s ms H1. apply H. exists s, ms. auto. + intros k s ms H1. apply H. exists s, ms. auto. - intros [H1 H2]. intros k s ms H3. split. + apply H1. apply H3. + apply H2. apply H3.
